Articles.Content:
I crash the Endurance into the prison.

My ruined prison.

You were sent to prison for that. The one you just crashed into.

Augustus' prison.

I move to Blalo, a habitable moon of Verion.

My base on Blalo.
the kestrel prison cruiser hunts you down and abducts you.

I hire the A-Team to take control of your prison cruiser.

My space pirate ship.

Michael Bay unleashes an asteroid the size of Texas on you.

Still my hill on Blalo.

I carve a giant doge face into Blalo. With doge beams.

My doge face.
I crash Fantoma into Blalo. My ruined Blalo.
Danny2462 crashes the game. My crashed game event log.

I watch the video on youtube

Danny's increased viewcount

I steal the views with a doge video.

My views.

I DDOS YouTube.

No one's views now, ha ha.
I floor breach your house. my roofless house.

I plant my flag on your roofless house.

My roofless house.

I bulldoze your house.

My rubble.

I plant my flag on your rubble.

My rubble.

I turn your flag into rubble.

My rubble.

YOU GOT NOSCOPED!

my +100

I rotate your rifle 180 degrees. It fires onto your head.

My 180 noscope headshot.

I post your 180 noscope headshot to the internet with your name fully replaced by my name.

My 180 noscope headshot.

I look and facepalm at how the battle has wandered so far from the hill. 

Nevermind the firefight, the hill has actually regrown grassy and proper all by itself because everone got distracted. 

Placing my flag atop it, I soon join it with a lawnchair and umbrella. 

Whatever you're doing, the hill is over here.
I make my own hill and sit on it. I get out a snack and eat.
JI take your snack. my snack.

I send a snack monster at you.

My snack monster.

I offer the snack monster a giant pile of snacks. It betrays you and runs over you (and the hill) repeatedly.

My trampled hill.
